sentences.english: Colorful carnations were placed in florist.
sentences.chinese: 五颜六色的香石竹被摆到花店里。

sentences.english: I decorated the van windows with colorful little lights.
sentences.chinese: 我用五颜六色的小灯装饰车窗。

sentences.english: Balloons of all colours are hanging from the lights.
sentences.chinese: 五颜六色的气球从灯上吊下来。

sentences.english: "The kids took one look at the male pup, a ragamuffin ball of string, and exclaimed, " Andy!
sentences.chinese: 公狗瞧一眼，它像是一只五颜六色又脏又乱的线团。

sentences.english: The banks are crowded with teak vessels painted in hues that mimic the tropical landscape.
sentences.chinese: 河岸边停满了模仿热带景观而漆成五颜六色的柚木船。

sentences.english: The seriousness of the guard's face is in great contrast with the walkers in different colors .
sentences.chinese: 哨兵的一脸严肃与行人五颜六色的妆容判若两个时代。

sentences.english: After spring rain, colorful flowers bloomed all over the mountain. ?
sentences.chinese: 春雨过后，满山遍野都开着五颜六色的花朵。

sentences.english: The colorful dyes shown are applied by hand to intricately designed copper vases.
sentences.chinese: 五颜六色的染料用于给人绘制设计铜花瓶。

sentences.english: An illustration composed of small,colored stones or tiles set into cement.
sentences.chinese: 用五颜六色的小石子或瓦片在水泥板上镶嵌成的图案。

sentences.english: The colorful crystal ball weighs almost five thousand four hundred kilograms.
sentences.chinese: 五颜六色的水晶球重近五四零零公斤。

sentences.english: Bring these colorful, bite-sized appetizers to your holiday parties. You can keep the fact that they are healthy a secret!
sentences.chinese: 把这些五颜六色，一口大小的开胃菜到您的假日聚会。

sentences.english: Gifts should always be well-wrapped in colorful wrapping paper.
sentences.chinese: 生日礼物应该五颜六色的包装纸里。

sentences.english: Light pillars can be observed in cities with many different colorful light sources.
sentences.chinese: 城市中五颜六色的光源形成了颜色各异的光柱。

sentences.english: Pigeons lifted from the roofs in a clatter of multicolored wings.
sentences.chinese: 鸽子在天花板下噼里啪啦地向上扑腾五颜六色的翅膀。

sentences.english: Light finds her treasure of colours through the ishagonism of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 光线在与云霓的匹敌中觅到了她五颜六色的宝贝。

sentences.english: The lamps of the gallery were full of gaseous neon, which made the light colorful.
sentences.chinese: 画廊的灯泡都充了气态的氖，这使得灯光五颜六色。

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
bright and multicolored/of rich variety/(fig.) dazzling/glitzy
lit. each color and each form (idiom)/diverse/various/all kinds of
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
fantastic oddities of every description (idiom); grotesquely shaped
